en.title: My Portfolio
en.description: Explore a selection of My Recent Projects and Creative works.

I was responsible for designing and developing the frontend of the BdMeubles e-commerce website using Nuxt with SCSS. This project was a collaborative effort with a Laravel developer who handled the backend API development. I managed the state using Pinia, ensuring that data was displayed categorically as required. My contributions included designing a carousel in the hero section, implementing the 'Add to Cart' functionality, and creating a Responsive header and footer. Additionally, I designed the single product page, the cart page, and the checkout page. This project was a team effort under the guidance of senior developers.

This is a restaurant app where I was responsible for designing the Home page, Menu page, and the Single Item Popup with additional item selection facility, as well as the Contact page. The design was provided in Figma, and I converted it to Nuxt, ensuring it was pixel-perfect and responsive. I focused on every single detail, implementing dynamic features to enhance the user experience and integrating interactive elements to make the app more user-friendly.

This is my open-source portfolio designed using Nuxt and Tailwind CSS, incorporating a Grid System for a structured layout. I utilized Nuxt Content to write and publish markdown blogs directly within the Nuxt app. A standout feature of this project is its super responsiveness, ensuring optimal performance across all devices. Additionally, the portfolio includes a dark mode toggler, allowing users to switch between light and dark themes seamlessly.

Nano Blog is a full-stack blog application that I developed as a practice project to hone my skills. The frontend is built using Nuxt and Tailwind CSS, providing a modern and responsive design. I implemented all the pages, including a comprehensive admin panel. For authentication, I used SideBase, ensuring secure access to the admin functionalities. The app employs Server-Side Rendering (SSR) to enhance performance and SEO. I utilized PrimeVue for dynamic components, making the interface interactive and user-friendly. The backend is powered by MongoDB, offering a robust database solution. Additionally, I integrated TipTap for a rich text editor, allowing users to create and format their blog posts with ease.

This is a E-commerce app where I was responsible for designing the Home page, Product page, Cart page, and the Checkout page. I designed the Admin Dashboard and implemented the CRUD operations for products and categories. The app was built using Nuxt for the frontend and Laravel for the backend.Here I also use Vue UI Library PrimeVue. I managed the state using Pinia, ensuring that data was displayed categorically as required.This project was a team effort under the guidance of senior developers.

This is a E-commerce app Dashboard where I was responsible for designing the All pages, Sidebar Layout. I also designed the Text Editor to write Product Description & Filter Popup. The app was built using Nuxt Js for the frontend and Laravel for the backend.Here I also use Vue UI Library PrimeVue. I managed the state using Pinia, ensuring that data was displayed categorically as required.This project was a team effort under the guidance of senior developers.
